name: PoiSon (Blue Team)
description:
PoiSon is a Celest/Pizza Tower/Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy-inspired game, where you play as PoiSon (Obviously), a Purple poison thing trying to get back to his creator's lab before he dies!

-CONTROLS-
  • A/D to move;
  • Space to jump;
  • Shift to dash;
    • If you dash into a wall you will jump off it.
 Collect this to regain health!

(Note: If the game locks unfinished, it's because it is, It was much bigger than I expected it😭😭😭)

- Blue Team 2023 / Tvx9
